title: Camera preview can be shown upside down on some phones
Update project to use Android Studio
HSV instead of RGB for calculateDistance
body: It's oft been remarked that calculating the "distance" between two colors in RGB space doesn't match human visual perceptions very well. There are many other color spaces that work better, but HSV (hue, saturation, value) is an easy one to use and could dramatically improve the results without much work. The relevant code to change is, I believe, calculateDistance at the end of ColorData.java.

title: Many strings made translatable
body: I made translatable all the strings from CameraActivity and MainActivity.

title: Better link to the license in "More info" section.
Color Namer update with sleeping
body: In this update was some strings in CameraActivity made to be translatable for future use. In the "More Info" section was "open-source" changed to "free and open-source" and added mention about the license.

title: Color Namer update
body: In this update was added feature that disables display getting sleep during its run. There was also some strings in CameraActivity made to be translatable for future use. In the "More Info" section was "open-source" changed to "free and open-source" and added mention about the license.

title: Get Preview Frame after every 500ms.
body:
Hello there,

How can I get camera preview frame after every 500ms. This application code is working fine for me, but how can I get colorcode value for every 500ms, for that i should calculate RGB value of preview frame after every 500ms. How can I do this ?

Thanks
Saurabh

title: Keep screen on
body: Stops the screen from sleeping while looking at all the pretty colors.

title: Blue Sky suggestion - add text file to save color
body:
I love this app i used to take pictures of things just to sample RGB or Hex in Photoshop.

it would be awesome to build a favorite color log text file or files (by project etc) and additionally add personal note or comment to each entry.

in gratitude,
Arthur

title: Add Flash - and removed code for invalid intent by android 4.4.2
body:
I have Removed the intent, a normal app can't send the intent on android 4.4.x
And add a little flash function for the camera that support flash

title: Allow arbitrary colour for wallpaper
body: Currently, when setting a colour for the wallpaper, the colour with the nearest proper name is chosen. I would like the wallpaper to be set to that of the exact colour value I've chosen.

title: License?
body: Great app (my mother loves it too). Just wondering if you could a put an explicit license in there like Apache of GPLv3 that would allow the likes of f-droid.org to redistribute it.
